full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/11/2023 REMITTER: LOFEZ. S. D. U.S S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE FILING DATE: 12/28/87 FOR: S. D. LOPEZ IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE A NUMBER: A92402041 QDE: 1671 WILSHIRE BLVD. BANK NO: 75-53 INTERVIEW DATE: 02/08/88 LOS ANGELES, CA 90017 RECEIPT NUMBER: XH0880612012 INTERVIEW TIME: 09:40 AM FEE TYPE: CMO AMOUNT: 185.00 FORM NO.: I687L THIS LETTER IS TO ACKNOWLEDGE RECEIPT OF YOUR APPLICATION FOR LECALIZATION. YOU ARE SCHEDULED TO APPEAR FOR AN INTERVIEW WITH A LEGALIZATION OFFICER ON 02/08/88. PLEASE BRING ANY ORIGINAL DOCUMENTS WHICH SUPPORT YOUR APPLICATION. IF YOU FAIL TO APPEAR AT THE DESIGNATED TIME AND PLACE, YOUR APPLICATION FOR LEGALIZATION MAY BE DENIED. THIS IS NOT AN AUTHORIZATION TO TRAVEL OUTSIDE THE UNITED STATES. THIS DOCUMENT BECOMES INVALID FOR ANY PURPOSE IF IT IS ALTERED. THIS DOCUMENT MAY ONLY BE DUPLICATED BY AN EMPLOYER FOR VERIFICATION PURPOSES. IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU CARRY THIS DOCUMENT WITH YOU AT ALL TIMES. YOU ARE GRANTED EMPLOYMENT AUTHORIZATION WHICH EXPIRES ON 02/08/88. YOU ARE NOT AUTHORIZED EMPLOYMENT BEYOND THAT DATE. SEBASTINA D. LOPEZ INTERVIEW DATE: 02/08/88 4216 WEST 1ST STREET INTERVIEW TIME: 09:40 LOS ANGELES, CA 90004 REPORT TO THE ADDRESS AT THE TOP CENTER OF THIS LETTER, ON THE DATE AND TIME STATED ABOVE. INS COPY DEPARTMENT OF immigration and Naturalization Service FORM NO. I689 5/87
